tool_description: Text URL PDF Summarization API With our api you will be able to extract the most important parts of copied texts, web texts and texts from pdf files.Our API Works with artificial intelligence and is very easy to use.Basically, you will have three apis in one. Text summaries, urls and pdfs.
name: text-url-pdf-summarization
title: text-url-pdf-summarization

api_list.name: url text
api_list.description:
In this method the text is extracted from up to 10 urls at once.

The parameters are:
urls: address of the urls to be summarized
Percent: percentage (0.2 to 0.8) representing 20% to 80%
Lang:
english
spanish
arabic
azerbaijani
Bengali
danish
dutch
finnish
french
german
greek
hungarian
indonesian
italian
kazakh
nepali
nonwegian
portuguese
romanian
russian
slovene
swedish
tajik
turkish

The results come in json as:

title: if the url has a title, our algorithm can recognize it and return this data.

marked_text: Text with html markings giving the most important parts according to percentage.

original_text: text without abstract, but can be used for other purposes.

summary: Just the text summary.

text_url: url of the summarized text.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-url-pdf-summarization.p.rapidapi.com/urls"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-url-pdf-summarization.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: pdf file
api_list.description:
In this method the pdf file must be in a url...
For example:
domain . com / file.pdf

The parameters are:
url: url fo the pdf file. 
Percent: percentage (0.2 to 0.8) representing 20% to 80%
Lang:
english

arabic
azerbaijani
Bengali
danish

romanian
russian
slovene
swedish
tajik
turkish

The results come in json as:

marked_text: Text with html markings giving the most important parts according to percentage.

summary_text: here you only have the summary

api_list.name: simple text
api_list.description:
In this method the text to be summarized must already be extracted from somewhere.

The parameters are:
Original_Text: Text to be summarized
Percent: percentage (0.2 to 0.8) representing 20% to 80%
Lang:

marked_text: Text with html markings giving the most important parts according to percentage.

original_text: text without abstract, but can be used for other purposes.

summary_text: here you only have the summary
